channel.title: Editing on Abizer Nasir

item.title: Commanding Your Text Editor
item.description: There’s a recent post up on the PeepCode Blog about Commanding Your Text Editor which has some handy tips for Emacs, Vim, Textmate, Sublime Text and the OS X. It’s a short read, and worth the time. More and more of our time is spent at a keyboard typing, whether you’re a programmer or not. Those of you who know me will have heard me talking about the Dvorak keyboard layout and my current attraction to Emacs.
